dct_title_s: II. Routes made in July and August 1884 by Dr. J. R. S. Sterrett in ancient Southern Cappadocia, constructed from his observations and measurements by Henry Kiepert, Berlin 1886
dct_description_sm: From: Papers of the American School of Classical Studies at Athens, v. II. Boston: Damrell and Upham, 1888.
